para.caption: Database support
para.text:
The XP framework features an easy-to-use database abstraction layer, consisting of (from a user's point of view) exactly one class.
Basically, all that needs to be done is use the DriverManager to retrieve a suitable connection object. At the moment, Sybase, MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite databases are fully supported, with more coming (as soon as the developers have access to one of these databases to verify their code actually works).
See the API documentation for a short example.
